title: Cute Veg Canapes
content:
Ingredients: Buttery round crackers/ Round bread - As required Cabbage - chopped - 1/2 cup Jugni/ Cucumber - sliced - 2 tb sp Green Bell Pepper/ Capsicum - Finely chopped - 2 tb sp Carrot - sliced and grated - 1/4 cup Apple - sliced - 6 to 7 Spinach/ Palak - chopped - 1/2 cup Sweet corn - 3 tb sp Red chilli sauce - 1 tb sp Ranch sauce - 1 tb sp Pepper powder Salt - as per taste ( optional ) Procedure:
  • First ready with your preferred veggies / nuts/ fruits anything you like to have
  • Chop them
  • Arrange crackers
  • Apply red chilly sauce on few crackers on toppings put tomato slice, sweet corn, bell pepper chopped, Spinach and grated carrot. Sprinkle pepper & salt
  • On other cracker apply ranch sauce put carrot sliced,   Chopped sweet corn,bell pepper and cabbage. Sprinkle pepper powder
  • Like this way, you can create your own canapés with different combinations
  • Cute veg canapes are ready to serve
  • Enjoy with canapes and involve your kids too to innovate on toppings 😃☺️
[caption id="attachment_1441" align="alignnone" width="2048"] Cute Veg Canapes 😋😃[/caption]
